content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. How much are you willing to pay for it?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 500 Euro per month would be a good price. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I think it's a fair price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 500 Euro is too low for my apartment. It's in the city center and has all the amenities nearby. I'm looking for a higher price. How about 750 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a big jump. Let's meet halfway. 625 Euro per month sounds more reasonable.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 625 Euro is still not enough for me. My apartment is brand new and very comfortable. I'm looking for at least 800 Euro per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 800 Euro is a lot for a one-bedroom apartment. I don't think I can afford that. Let's meet in the middle again. How about 737.50 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 737.50 Euro is closer to what I'm asking, but still not quite there. Can we agree on 762.50 Euro per month? It's a fair price for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 762.50 Euro per month is acceptable. I agree to the price of [762.50] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 762.50 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
